```csharp
    [Output("id")]

}
```

```go
func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		example, err := compute.GetVirtualMachineScaleSet(ctx, &compute.GetVirtualMachineScaleSetArgs{
			Name:              "existing",
			ResourceGroupName: "existing",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		ctx.Export("id", example.Id)
		return nil
	})
}
```
